data.actual_result: The group member screen appears in landscape and is partially obstructed by the notch
data.expected_result: The screen should be padded to avoid the notch, or should automatically switch to portrait like the voice settings screen
data.short_description: Title bar/member avatars obstructed on the group DM member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a group DM - Start or join a video call - Rotate to landscape (anticlockwise) - Tap the ellipses (3 dots) and then tap Members
